column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////This cafe is great when you want to hang out with a couple of friends and catch up
column2: but there were a few things that I didn't enjoy. Their coffee is overpriced for a small cup of coffee that doesn't really taste like it's worth it. The space is very small and it can get very busy
column3: so if you are on the run or want a pick me up
column4: the wait will be quite long. For parking
column5: there is a small lot that they share with other businesses so it is quite limited.
